name: CarGADE
description:
CarGADE is a racing arcade game. You are a midnight racer and you have only one goal, to go as far as possible and you also need to refuel your car from time to time.

This is game for "Arcade 2020" gamejam

-------------------------------------Controls-----------------------

W or Up arrow - go up (in car)

S or Down arrow - go down (in car)

A or Left arrow - go left (in platformer)

D or Right arrow - go right (in platformer)

Space - jump (in platformer)

F3 - set fullscreen

F4 - exit from fullscreen

esc - escape from game
